landing.title: Machine learning, better, together
landing.subtitle: An open platform with machine-readable datasets, automated training, and reproducible benchmarks.

lifecycle.header: OpenML simplifies the entire machine learning lifecycle
lifecycle.sub_header: and organizes everything into one collective memory

ai_ready_data.title: AI-ready data
ai_ready_data.text: All datasets are uniformy formatted, have rich, consistent metadata, and can be loaded directly into your favourite environments.

integrations.title: ML library integrations
integrations.text: Pipelines and models can be shared directly from your favourite machine learning libraries. No manual steps required.

ml_results.title: A treasure of ML results
ml_results.text: Learn from millions of reproducible machine learning benchmarks from thousands of models trained on thousands of datasets.

integration.heading: Frictionless machine learning
integration.subtitle: Easily import and export datasets, pipelines, and experiments from your favourite machine learning environments and libraries.

hero.line2: The ones who want to set machine learning free.
hero.line3: They're not fond of hype, or irreproducible claims.
hero.line4: They believe that only openness will push us forward.
hero.line5: And by sharing the best data and models,
hero.line6: we will make the world better, together.

contribute_intro.title: Contributing
contribute_intro.text:
The people who contribute to OpenML do so for the love of
machine learning and because they want to help build a more
inclusive and frictionless ecosystem of data, tools and clear
results. You can contribute in different ways:
items: Help us improve the OpenML platform and interfaces.
Make a donation to support our community and keep OpenML free.
Share new interesting datasets, models, and experiments.

help_dev.title: Are you a developer?
help_dev.text:
We want to make OpenML ridiculously easy to use and empowering.
Contribute your skill and expertise to make OpenML better for yourself and others, either online (on GitHub) or during one of our coding sprints.

help_science.title: Are you a scientist?
help_science.text:
We want to empower people to change the world for the
better. You can help by creating or sharing useful datasets and machine learning pipelines, or by extending OpenML to
make it more useful in science and discovery.

help_donate.title: Are you one of us?
help_donate.text:
OpenML depends on all of us. You can help keep OpenML free
and support our community by making a donation (no pressure).
You can also join us at an OpenML event, or organize one
yourself! Or maybe you have another great idea? Please don't hesitate to reach out!

help_exec.title: Are you an executive?
help_exec.text:
OpenML helps your team to discover machine learning assets
and automate processes, so that they can focus on what
matters. You can encourage your developers to help out, host a coding sprint, become an official sponsor, or partner with us. Legendary.

code.title: Good at coding?
code.text:
Perfect! Please see the issue trackers of the different OpenML
components that you can contribute to.

website.title: Good at web design / UX?
website.text:
Please help us improve the website to make it nicer and more
intuitive for everyone.

docs.title: Good at explaining things?
docs.text:
OpenML should be easy to understand for everyone. Please help us
improve the documentation whenever something is not 100% clear.

datasets.title: Do you care about good datasets?
datasets.text:
High quality datasets are crucial for machine learning. Please
add new interesting datasets or help check the quality of the
existing ones.

ambassador.title: Help us build a stronger community
ambassador.text:
Become an OpenML ambassador! Help us make OpenML better known in
your community, write about OpenML and how you use it, or give
us shout-out.

donate.title: You are awesome!
donate.text:
By making a donation, small or large, you help
us run coding sprints and outreach activities, keep our   community happy and engaged, and ensure that we have the basic
infrastructure to keep the platform free for everyone. Also, if
OpenML sometimes sucks, we promise to do better!
You can sponsor us via OpenCollective or GitHub. All donors are celebrated in our hall of fame, and we are fully transparent on how your contributions are used.

sponsor_why.title: Why?
sponsor_why.text:
Simply put, without our generous sponsors, OpenML would not be
able to make all its resources and services available for free to the entire world. By donating to OpenML you
further the project's mission to democratize machine learning
research. Your donations will be used to run engaging community
events (which require venues, food, and swag), support our
community manager and developer, and run our infrastructure
(including servers and storage).

sponsor_what.title: What do we offer?
sponsor_what.text:
We are open to many forms of sponsorship. While we have a few sponsorship levels on our Open Collective page, we would also
  love to hear from you and learn how we could better align with
  your goals. Below are examples of possible benefits, but we are
  open to new ideas to collaborate with you.
items: Your logo on our website and in our presentations, shown more prominently for larger sponsors.
We will send you OpenML T-shirts, stickers,... Or, you can send us materials to hand out at our events.
We will mention your support in talks and videos. We'll work with you to get the right message across.
Come give a talk at one of our coding sprints or events, or simply come to work together with us.
Let us know what you would like to see developed on OpenML, and we'll realize it together.
Become a partner. If you support a full time developer (anywhere), or let your own developers contribute, you can help shape the future of OpenML.

sponsor_how.title: How?
sponsor_how.text:
You can sponsor us through Open Collective or GitHub. Click the buttons below to get started. All sponsors and the amount of sponsoring are acknowledged in our hall of fame, and we'll be fully transparent
  on how your sponsorship makes OpenML better every day. This
  collective is fiscally hosted by our not-for-profit Open Machine Learning Foundation. If preferred, you can also donate directly to the Foundation.
